fields.name: Silver
fields.benefits: Priority check-in, Extra baggage allowance, Lounge access on international flights

fields.name: Gold
fields.benefits: Priority boarding, Free seat selection, Lounge access on all flights, Free upgrades when available

fields.name: Platinum
fields.benefits: First class check-in, Unlimited lounge access, Free upgrades to business class, Dedicated customer service, Free companion ticket annually
